tool_description: The Wordle Game API allows developers to integrate a fun word-guessing game into their applications. Players can make guesses of five-letter English words, and the API will return a string indicating which letters are correct, which are incorrect but present in the word, and which are not present at all. The API generates a new secret word every 24 hours to keep the game fresh and challenging.
name: Wordle Game API
title: Wordle Game API

api_list.name: today word
api_list.description: get today word or the correct answer
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wordle-game-api1.p.rapidapi.com/word"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wordle-game-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wordle-game-api1.p.rapidapi.com/word"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wordle-game-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
